description:
* trying to start the migration of an instance (running on xen) is not possible because the instance is in state blocked (instance is up and running)
  * the instance is the most time in state blocked (not sure if this is a problem with xen?) 
  * but i think it should be the job of nova to find a way to migrate the instance, i don't want to wait until a status update in nova to try it again
